text: Hubl needs a way to get normal pages in a listing, dynamically made based on a query or tags or even menu. that way you could easy create dynamic list pages. with a normal cms-page template. Blogs are not the way, to create a team members page or maybe another non blog listing. And editing a list page every time a team member detail page is created, is very error sensitive.

Hi! I'm not sure if this is the correct location to put this but i was wondering if anyone has run into issues with the default content on the menu module in the drag and drop templates? The orientation and flyout radial options are not making any changes for me when I publish them. I'm probably missing something obvious but I haven't found anything in the dev docs.
Hi can anyone help me out on repeater modules? I'm having an extremely difficult time on them
